item.title: A certain hacker address sold 8960 ETH in the last 50 minutes.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yin Jianguo, a hacker address sold 8,960 ETH in the past 50 minutes at a price of $4,382 and exchanged it for 39.264 million DAI.The hacker withdrew 8,960 ETH from Tornado.Cash through 3 addresses. These ETH are likely ones that the hacker had previously deposited into Tornado.Cash from other addresses. After withdrawing these 8,960 ETH from Tornado.Cash, they were immediately sold and exchanged for 39.264 million DAI within the past 50 minutes.

item.title: Top WLFI Investor Claimed 200 Million WLFI Tokens 10 Minutes Ago, Achieving a Return on Investment of 296.33%
item.description: On September 1st, according to on-chain data analyst Yujin Monitoring, the largest activated account WLFI investor @moonmanifest47 claimed that 10 minutes ago, 20% of today's unlocked tokens were acquired, which is equivalent to 2 billion WLFI (approximately $59.45 million).It is reported that the investor subscribed to 1 billion WLFI in the first round of the public sale by investing $15 million USDC at an average price of $0.015.BlockBeats Note: Based only on the investor's initial unlocked share, their current return on investment has reached 296.33%.

item.title: Justin Sun: Currently, there is no plan to sell WLFI, and I believe WLFI is one of the most important projects in the crypto space.
item.description: On September 1st, Justin Sun made a post on social media, expressing that he firmly believes WLFI will become one of the largest and most significant projects in the cryptocurrency domain and currently has no intention of promptly selling the unlocked tokens. The long-term vision of the project is extremely strong, and he wholeheartedly agrees with its mission.Meanwhile, to commemorate the listing of the WLFI token, he has promised to increase the total circulation on the TRON chain to USD 200 million.

item.title: WLFI briefly dropped below $0.26.
item.description: On September 1st, based on HTX market data, WLFI briefly fell below $0.26 and is currently trading at $0.262.

item.title: Binance Launches Medá in Mexico, Plans to Invest $53 Million Over the Next 4 Years
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, Binance has set up a regulated Electronic Payment Fund Institution (IFPE) called Medá in Mexico. It is planned to invest more than 1 billion pesos (approximately 53 million USD) in it within the next four years.The official announcement shows that Medá will offer fiat currency deposit and withdrawal services. It will be operated by an independent vertical team and focus on promoting the development of Binance's financial technology services across Latin America, setting a new standard for innovation, compliance, and user trust.

item.title: Backpack Launches WLFI Spot Trading
item.description: On September 1st, according to official channels, Backpack Exchange has now initiated WLFI spot trading.

item.title: The WLFI contract 4-hour funding rate on Binance has dropped to -0.3446%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the 4-hour funding rate of the WLFI contract on the Binance platform dropped to -0.3446%, and the daily rate was -2.067%.

item.title: DOLO is down 17.8% in the last 24 hours, currently trading at $0.267
item.description: On September 1st, based on HTX market data, DOLO dropped below $0.27 and is now trading at $0.267, with a 24-hour decline of 17.8%.BlockBeats Note: DOLO is one of the WLFI concept project tokens. Dolomite is a DeFi service provider pegged to USD1, and co-founder Corey Caplan is also the CTO of WLFI.

item.title: On Binance, the WLFI contract's 4-hour funding rate has decreased to -0.23%, with a daily rate of -1.39%.
item.description: On September 1st, based on market data, the funding rate of WLFI perpetual contracts on some CEXs is currently showing an abnormal negative value, suggesting that a large number of traders are taking short positions on WLFI. On the Binance platform, the 4-hour rate is currently at -0.2317% (with the daily rate reaching -1.39%).

item.title: The WLFI pre-market contract on Hyperliquid has been converted to a regular contract, now supporting up to 5x leverage.
item.description: On September 1st, as per official information, the WLFI perpetual contract on Hyperliquid has been transformed into a standard contract, which is capable of supporting up to 5 times leverage.
